name: InDash
description:
InDash - Animal Rescue

Who would be able to program robots with the intention of kidnapping and confining animals to do terrible experiments on another planet? It is still unknown who is responsible for these cruel acts. The InDash Team is on a mission to rescue the animals and return them to their natural habitat - planet Earth. A platform game developed based on many other platform games! Simple and fun mecanics. With each new level, a new adventure! To proceed in the game, you will need to collect all items. Be very careful not to get hit by rigged robots. To Animal Rescue, InDash!  

Keyboard :

Move  -  Left and Right  or  '' A '' and '' D '' 

Jump  -  Up  or  '' W ''

Dash  -  Space 

InDash Platform Game

Developed by Samuel Meireles - 2023

Softwares used: CorelDraw, Photosop, Audacity, Unity (C# Visual Studio)

Artistic Interactive Life

''It is the obstacles of the journey that generate my strength to continue.''

Thank you so much for playing my hard-earned project!
